alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 09 at 1:01AM CST until March 09 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CST FOR CENTRAL MOBILE COUNTY... At 101 AM CST, a confirmed tornado was located near Mobile Regional Airport, or 4 miles west of Midtown Mobile, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Prichard, I65 And I165 and I65 And AL 158 around 120 AM CST. Saraland and Chickasaw around 125 AM CST. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW! Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
